item.title: Osho in 2022: Media Coverage and Stats
item.author: felix.brilej@googlemail.com (Felix Brilej)
item.description: The Indian guru Bhagwan - also later known as Osho - has been one of the most widely known mystics of our time. After his death in January 1990, suddenly his media coverage seems to rise again. An investigation in numbersâ€¦
